name: Cyberworld
description:
Cyber World is a 2.5D sidescroller game which plays at a recycling centre. You play as R1142, the servant robot, it manages to wake up and decides to escape from Cyber World. 

Download and play the game at the bottom of the page! Story

R1142 is working for its master, like all robots in the 2090's, but now it is starting to show self conciusness. This makes it harder for the robot to follow the orders given to it by its owner. One day the master calls CyberWorld and complains about the malfunctioning in the robot's behaviour.  The company's answer is that they're going to replace the robot with a more advanced version that always will obey orders without any problems.  The day after, the robot gets  picked up by a  truck from CyberWorld full of other identical malfunctioning robots. The master shuts off R1142 and it is moved into the truck with all the other robots. The truck drives to the recycling centre and drops of the pile of noncompliant robots. R1142 and the others are left to be recycled. But as R1142's shut down body is leaning on a dumpster, something happens...

It wakes up...

Gameplay
  1. Avoid or destroy enemy robots
  2. Avoid to be detected by CCTVs
  3. Avoid dangerous objects in the game enviroonment
  4. Jump challenges
System requirements

OS: Windows 10

CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600K CPU @ 3.40GHz   3.40 GHz

GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080

RAM: 16GB

Resolution: 1920x1080

Team

A team of students including 2 designers/programmers and 3 artists. CyberWorld was developed under a 10 weeks course as a school project.

Instructions

Download CyberWorld.zip > Unzip the folder > Run Cyber HD.exe
